# Julian Aijal's Personal Website and Blog

> My personal website and blog, built with modern web technologies. This site showcases my projects, and hosts articles on web development, technology, and more.

## Main Pages

- [Homepage](https://julianaijal.com/): The main landing page of the site.
- [Articles](https://julianaijal.com/articles): A collection of my blog posts and articles.
